We have 4 deals in 4 locations. All containers are 4 CPU Core fair share. Every location is gigabit BUT Chicago.

----------------------------
Lenoir, North Carolina - Dacentec
Chicago, Illinois - ColoCrossing
Los Angeles, California - ColoCrossing (Quadranet)

----------------------------

All Containers are SolusVM/OpenVZ
